email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 18-20 October? Also, please confirm the vessel’s readiness and any additional terms. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the laycan is confirmed for 18-20 October. The MV Ocean Star is currently in Singapore and will arrive in Houston by the 15th. Attached are the draft charter party terms for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the terms look good. Let’s proceed with the charter at $51.25 per metric ton. Please send the final contract for signing. Thanks for your assistance. Cheers, John.
